mapper.select: select * from users where id = #{id} and password = #{password} limit 1
select * from users where id = #{id} and delYn ='N'
mapper.insert: insert into `users` (userName, id, `password`, regDate) values (#{userName}, #{id}, #{password}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'))
insert into `message` (msgName, msgEmail, `msgContents`, regDate) values (#{msgName}, #{msgEmail}, #{msgContents}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'))

select case when max(boardNo) > 0 then max(boardNo) else 1 end as boardNo from board
insert into files (boardNo, fileName, fileURL, userNo, regDate) values (#{boardNo},#{fileName},#{fileURL},#{userNo},DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'));
insert into board (boardTitle, boardContents, userNo, category, regDate) values (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{userNo}, #{category}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'));
